mapper.select: select role_name,sr.id from user left join sys_user_role_relation surr on user.id=surr.user_id left join sys_role sr on sr.id=surr.role_id where username=#{name};

select distinct permission_code from sys_role_permission_relation sr left join sys_permission sp on sr.permission_id=sp.id where sr.role_id in
#{roles.id}
